basement_water.displayName: Basement Water Control (Interior Drain + Sump + Discharge)

productOptions.name: Interior Perimeter Drain System
productOptions.notes: Designed to collect water at the footing line and route to sump.

productOptions.name: Sump Pump System
productOptions.notes: Specify basin location + discharge route.

productOptions.name: Discharge / Extensions / FreezeGuard / IceGuard (as applicable)
productOptions.notes: Route must follow topography and avoid obstructions. Confirm termination location.

productOptions.name: Wall Vapor Barrier / Drainage Membrane (as applicable)
productOptions.spacingRule: Continuous on affected walls (LF/SF depending on branch standard)
productOptions.notes: Use when seepage/efflorescence or porous block present.

productOptions.name: Dehumidifier (as applicable)
productOptions.notes: Add when humidity > 60% or odor/mold concerns; ensure coverage matches cubic footage.

productOptions.name: Crawlspace Interior Drain
productOptions.notes: Confirm linear footage and route to pit.

productOptions.name: Sump Pump System
productOptions.notes: Confirm pit location relative to low point.

productOptions.name: Discharge Line
productOptions.notes: Confirm included/excluded; route + termination location.

productOptions.name: Encapsulation / Liner
productOptions.notes: Confirm wall height coverage and seams/tape requirements.

productOptions.name: Crawl Door
productOptions.notes: Add if needed for proper seal/access.

productOptions.name: Dehumidifier / Air System
productOptions.notes: Ensure coverage matches cubic area.

productOptions.name: Insulation Removal (if applicable)
productOptions.notes: Include if wet/falling/contaminated.

productOptions.name: Mold Treatment (if applicable)
productOptions.notes: Include per branch standard when mold present.

floor_framing.displayName: Floor Framing Stabilization (Beams + Supports + Joist Repair)

productOptions.name: Supplemental Beam (lumber/S4/c-channel)
productOptions.notes: Specify beam path + bearing points; account for obstructions.

productOptions.name: Floor Supports (SettleStop Floor Support / IntelliJack)
productOptions.notes: Typical spacing is branch-specific; set spacing per span/load. Record exact layout in ArcSite.

productOptions.name: Sister Joists (if needed)
productOptions.notes: Use where joists are damaged/undersized; note extent.

productOptions.name: Moisture Mitigation Add-on
productOptions.notes: If wood moisture >16% or humidity >60%, pair with crawlspace water control.

productOptions.name: PolyRenewal Stabilization / Lift
productOptions.notes: Stabilization is the guarantee; lift is attempted—avoid promising perfection.

productOptions.name: Crack / Joint Caulk Repair
productOptions.notes: Measure cracks/joints; note trip hazards and transitions.

productOptions.name: Carbon Fiber (if eligible)
productOptions.notes: Typically for low deflection and no shearing. Verify eligibility per branch rules.

productOptions.name: IntelliBrace / Brace System (if eligible)
productOptions.notes: Check joist compatibility; measure base/mid/top in same plane.

productOptions.name: Wall Anchors / Helical Anchors (if eligible)
productOptions.notes: Property line constraints may remove anchor options.

productOptions.name: C-Channel Requirement (when shearing/advanced movement)
productOptions.notes: Use when shearing/tipping requires stronger distribution.
